messages.message: Never give up on something you can't go a day without thinking about.
The hardest part of acting like you dont care, is knowing how much you actually do.
The worst feeling is when something is killing you inside, and you have to act like you don't care.
Sometimes you have to forget what you feel and remember what you deserve.
Relationships end because once the person has you, they stop doing the things it took to get you.
The worst feeling ever is not knowing whether you should wait or give up..
There comes a point in your life when you realize who really matters, who never did, and who always will.
The couples that are meant to be, are the ones who go through everything that is meant to tear them apart, and come out even stronger.
Don't stress over anything that you can't change.
Over thinking is what really kills you.
It's sad when you realize you aren't as important to someone as you thought you were.
If you give up, it means you never really wanted it.
Treat your girl right, or sit back and watch someone else do it for you.
Be with someone who won't stay mad at you, who can't stand not talking to you, and who's afraid of losing you.
If a girl is stupid enough to love you after you broke her heart, I guarantee you, she is the one.
Fake friends believe in rumors. Real friends believe in you.
Don't change for anyone. People will love you for who you are, or you don't need them in your life.
Everybody deserves second chances, but not for the same mistakes.
Don't lie, don't cheat, and don't make promises you can't keep.
Don't apologize, and then do it again.
testing
